resources.string: Long press box to save color
Turn on screen when connecting or disconnecting charger
To add per app control, activate \'%1$s\' and press \'\u002b\' on the menu bar
Lights in do not disturb mode
Customize the look of the status bar battery icon
Percent only when battery is low
Show battery percentage only when the battery level is under %1$d%%
Set the color of the status bar battery icon while charging
Show the battery percentage outside the icon while charging
Show the battery percentage inside the icon while charging
Show a symbol near percentage text outside the battery icon when charging
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
View or change how the \'cLock\' widget will display
Volume down for do not disturb
allow volume down to enter do not disturb mode
Volume up in do not disturb
allow volume up to exit do not disturb mode
Show do not disturb switch on volume panel
Show brightness slider on quick settings panel
Show a brightness icon to the left of the brightness slider to adjust auto-brightness
Show battery percentage when not charging
Configure what icons are shown on status bar
Enable to adapt navigation bar color to apps primary dark color.Restart your desired app to see effect
Double tap on the navigation bar to put the device to sleep
Lock screen double tap to sleep
Double tap anywhere on the lock screen to put the device to sleep
Status bar double tap to sleep
Double tap on the status bar to put the device to sleep
Choose an icon for displaying the weather condition
Choose when the weather panel should be hidden
The weather panel will be hidden when the visible notifications will reach the maximum allowed notifications on the lock screen
The weather panel will be hidden when the visible notifications will reach the chosen number of notifications
The weather panel won\`t be hidden
Change the default font of the lock screen clock widget
Swipe three fingers across the screen to screenshot
Show notification as heads up from these applications
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Allow or disable peeking for all notifications
Allow scrolling through the small QS tiles
Disables quick settings on secure lock screen
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Hide the traffic monitor activity arrows
Allows swiping on the navigation bar to enable one handed mode
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
For better visibility on bright images
Long press on any image to use for static mode
Blocking alarms have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Display additional charging info on lockscreen while charging
View the settings for AOSP recents
Use OmniSwitch instead of the default recents view
If using OmniSwitch as recents alternative, make sure you have OmniSwitch enabled
Use slim recents instead of the default recents view
View the settings for slim recents
Don\'t exclude the topmost task in recents view
Are you sure you want to reset Slim Recent to stock color?
Apply a custom icon pack for apps in the panel
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Show app shortcuts on the other edge
Configure the content of the app sidebar
Reduce recents opening lag by disabling this
Clear recents by long pressing the memory bar
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the Reset icon.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Longpress power button with screen off turns on torch
Change the shortcuts right under the lockscreen clock
Long press to open apps from shortcuts
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the reset option.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Kill the foreground app by long-pressing the back key

Show temp with scale and image
Show temp with image without scale
Longpress power button with screen of turns on torch
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Show notification when connecting wired headsets
Adjust volume buttons action based on current orientation
With screen off, long pressing the volume keys will seek tracks
May not wake device if music control is active and music is playing
Attention: Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app.
Makes it so one click will turn WiFi on or off instead of taking you to settings
Makes it so one click will turn Bluetooth on or off instead of taking you to settings
Makes it so one click will turn Data on or off instead of taking you to settings
Show power menu on secure lock screen
Enable colored status and navigation bars when battery saver is activated
Display a warning at bottom of QS panel when network is monitored by external apps or vpn
View the settings for sound and volume
Launch music app on headset connection
Launch the default music app when headset is connected
